readable.title: 973827791_467d83986e
readable.content: A little kid splashes around in the kiddie pool while a lady watches . a woman dumping water on a small child who is in a pool A woman is throwing a bucket of water over a baby in the paddling pool . A woman is throwing water on a child in a plastic swimming pool in a rural area . I child slides into a wading pool full of water while an adult tosses a bucket of water on them .
